AngularJS

AngularJS is a JavaScript framework. It can be added to an HTML page with a <script> tag. AngularJS extends HTML attributes with Directives, and binds data to HTML with Expressions.

JavaScript Framework

  • is a JavaScript framework

  • add with a script

  • extends HTML with new attributes
  • perfect for Single Page Applications (SPAs)

Extends HTML

  • ng-app - defines an Angular JS app
  • ng-model - binds the HTML value to app data

  • ng-bind - binds app data to HTML
